TopicTitle: Krussian National Anthem! for all the Krussian Komrades!

Articles.Content:
Komrade Jebediah created the Koviet Union komrades! Here its national anthem!

Lyrics (translated):

Komrade Jebediah

created the union

of the koviet nations

from Kerbin to Minmus

Everyone near Kerbol

shall sing our anthem

for Komrade Jebediah

and all the koviets!

Komrade Jebediah is here

Right in our hearts komrade

heated up by our koviet Vodka

Ka! Komrade come and drink with us!

There's still room

for all the kerbals

Komrade Jebediah is protecting us!

Komrade Jebediah

created the union

of the koviet nations

from Kerbin to Minmus

Everyone near Kerbol

shall sing our anthem

for Komrade Jebediah

and all the koviets!

Komrade Jebediah is here

Right in our hearts komrade

heated up by our koviet Vodka

Ka! Komrade come and drink with us!

There's still room

for all the kerbals

Komrade Jebediah is protecting us!

And, there is plenty of vodka!

Komrades, you're safe even on Eeloo

Komrade Jebediah is flying with you

He'll live forever in our hearts

You can count on that!, he's always here for you.

From Moho to Eeloo

the koviets are here

they're rulling Kerbol

for Kormade Jebediah!

Komrade Jebediah is here

Right in our hearts komrade

heated up by our koviet Vodka

Ka! Komrade come and drink with us!

There's still room

for all the kerbals

Komrade Jebediah is protecting us!

Komrade Jebediah is right here

Right in our hearts komrades!

He's

Kormade

Jebediah

Edited July 16, 2014 by Cochonrambo31

Brought tears to my eyes. Such glory. Such power. Such wonder.

Salute to Komrade Jebediah!
